xs:element.name: SubReportInformationList
xs:element.msdata:DataType: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[MedicalSystem.AnesWorkStation.Domain.Report.ReportInformation, MedicalSystem.AnesWorkStation.Domain, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089

ReportTitle.StrSql: select nvl(b.Anes_Effect, '其他') ANES_EFFECT, sum(a.EMERGENCY_IND) 急诊, SUM(DECODE(a.EMERGENCY_IND, 0, 1, 0)) 择期, SUM(CASE WHEN a.EMERGENCY_IND IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 其他， count(*) 总数, sum(case when b.death_after_oper = 1 or b.anes_death = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as 死亡 from med_operation_master a, MED_ANESTHESIA_INPUT_DATA b where a.patient_id = b.patient_id(+) and a.visit_id = b.visit_id(+) and a.oper_id = b.oper_id(+) AND a.oper_status_code > 35 and a.anes_start_time >= :STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.anes_method like '%'||:vanesmethod||'%' or :vanesmethod is null) and (a.anes_doctor = :vanesdoctor or :vanesdoctor is null) and (a.operation_name like '%'||:voperationname||'%' or :voperationname is null) and (a.dept_code = :deptcode or :deptcode is null) group by b.Anes_Effect order by b.Anes_Effect

select d.inp_no, A.PATIENT_ID, A.VISIT_ID, A.OPER_ID, b.name, B.SEX, fun_get_pat_age( b.date_of_birth ,a.in_date_time ) age, nvl(c.dept_name, a.dept_code) deptname, a.operation_name, TO_CHAR(a.in_date_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') start_date_time, nvl(u1.user_name,a.surgeon) surgeon, a.oper_scale, a.anes_method, nvl(u2.user_name,a.anes_doctor) anes_doctor, a.asa_grade, to_char(a.start_date_time,'hh24:mi') opertime, decode(a.emergency_ind,1,'急诊','择期') emergency_ind, nvl(u3.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE) FIRST_OPER_NURSE, nvl(u4.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE) FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE from med_operation_master a, med_pat_master_index b, med_dept_dict c,med_pat_visit d, med_his_users u1,med_his_users u2,med_his_users u3,med_his_users u4 ,MED_ANESTHESIA_INPUT_DATA f where a.patient_id = b.patient_id and a.patient_id=d.patient_id(+) AND A.VISIT_ID=D.VISIT_ID(+) and a.dept_code = c.dept_code(+) and a.surgeon= u1.user_job_id(+) and a.anes_doctor=u2.user_job_id(+) and a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE = u3.user_job_id(+) and a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE = u4.user_job_id(+) and A.OPER_STATUS_CODE>35 and a.patient_id = f.patient_id(+) and a.visit_id = f.visit_id(+) and a.oper_id = f.oper_id(+) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.dept_code=:deptcode or :deptcode is null) and (a.anes_method like '%' || :vanesmethod || '%' or :vanesmethod is null) and (a.anes_doctor = :vanesdoctor or :vanesdoctor is null) and (a.operation_name like '%' || :voperationname || '%' or :voperationname is null) AND nvl(F.Anes_Effect, '其他') = :VANES_EFFECT

select d.inp_no, A.PATIENT_ID, A.VISIT_ID, A.OPER_ID, b.name, B.SEX, fun_get_pat_age( b.date_of_birth ,a.in_date_time ) age, nvl(c.dept_name, a.dept_code) deptname, a.operation_name, TO_CHAR(a.in_date_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') start_date_time, nvl(u1.user_name,a.surgeon) surgeon, a.oper_scale, a.anes_method, nvl(u2.user_name,a.anes_doctor) anes_doctor, a.asa_grade, to_char(a.start_date_time,'hh24:mi') opertime, decode(a.emergency_ind,1,'急诊','择期') emergency_ind, nvl(u3.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE) FIRST_OPER_NURSE, nvl(u4.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE) FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE from med_operation_master a, med_pat_master_index b, med_dept_dict c,med_pat_visit d, med_his_users u1,med_his_users u2,med_his_users u3,med_his_users u4 ,MED_ANESTHESIA_INPUT_DATA f where a.emergency_ind=1 and a.patient_id = b.patient_id and a.patient_id=d.patient_id(+) AND A.VISIT_ID=D.VISIT_ID(+) and a.dept_code = c.dept_code(+) and a.surgeon= u1.user_job_id(+) and a.anes_doctor=u2.user_job_id(+) and a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE = u3.user_job_id(+) and a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE = u4.user_job_id(+) and A.OPER_STATUS_CODE>35 and a.patient_id = f.patient_id(+) and a.visit_id = f.visit_id(+) and a.visit_id = d.visit_id(+) and a.oper_id = f.oper_id(+) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.dept_code=:deptcode or :deptcode is null) and (a.anes_method like '%' || :vanesmethod || '%' or :vanesmethod is null) and (a.anes_doctor = :vanesdoctor or :vanesdoctor is null) and (a.operation_name like '%' || :voperationname || '%' or :voperationname is null) AND nvl(F.Anes_Effect, '其他') = :VANES_EFFECT

select d.inp_no, A.PATIENT_ID, A.VISIT_ID, A.OPER_ID, b.name, B.SEX, fun_get_pat_age( b.date_of_birth ,a.in_date_time ) age, nvl(c.dept_name, a.dept_code) deptname, a.operation_name, TO_CHAR(a.in_date_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') start_date_time, nvl(u1.user_name,a.surgeon) surgeon, a.oper_scale, a.anes_method, nvl(u2.user_name,a.anes_doctor) anes_doctor, a.asa_grade, to_char(a.start_date_time,'hh24:mi') opertime, decode(a.emergency_ind,1,'急诊','择期') emergency_ind, nvl(u3.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE) FIRST_OPER_NURSE, nvl(u4.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE) FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE from med_operation_master a, med_pat_master_index b, med_dept_dict c,med_pat_visit d, med_his_users u1,med_his_users u2,med_his_users u3,med_his_users u4 ,MED_ANESTHESIA_INPUT_DATA f where a.emergency_ind=0 and a.patient_id = b.patient_id and a.patient_id=d.patient_id(+) AND A.VISIT_ID=D.VISIT_ID(+) and a.dept_code = c.dept_code(+) and a.surgeon= u1.user_job_id(+) and a.anes_doctor=u2.user_job_id(+) and a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE = u3.user_job_id(+) and a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE = u4.user_job_id(+) and A.OPER_STATUS_CODE>35 and a.patient_id = f.patient_id(+) and a.visit_id = f.visit_id(+) and a.visit_id = d.visit_id(+) and a.oper_id = f.oper_id(+) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.dept_code=:deptcode or :deptcode is null) and (a.anes_method like '%' || :vanesmethod || '%' or :vanesmethod is null) and (a.anes_doctor = :vanesdoctor or :vanesdoctor is null) and (a.operation_name like '%' || :voperationname || '%' or :voperationname is null) AND nvl(F.Anes_Effect, '其他') = :VANES_EFFECT

select d.inp_no, A.PATIENT_ID, A.VISIT_ID, A.OPER_ID, b.name, B.SEX, fun_get_pat_age( b.date_of_birth ,a.in_date_time ) age, nvl(c.dept_name, a.dept_code) deptname, a.operation_name, TO_CHAR(a.in_date_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') start_date_time, nvl(u1.user_name,a.surgeon) surgeon, a.oper_scale, a.anes_method, nvl(u2.user_name,a.anes_doctor) anes_doctor, a.asa_grade, to_char(a.start_date_time,'hh24:mi') opertime, decode(a.emergency_ind,1,'急诊','择期') emergency_ind, nvl(u3.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE) FIRST_OPER_NURSE, nvl(u4.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE) FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE from med_operation_master a, med_pat_master_index b, med_dept_dict c,med_pat_visit d, med_his_users u1,med_his_users u2,med_his_users u3,med_his_users u4 ,MED_ANESTHESIA_INPUT_DATA f where a.emergency_ind is null and a.patient_id = b.patient_id and a.patient_id=d.patient_id(+) AND A.VISIT_ID=D.VISIT_ID(+) and a.dept_code = c.dept_code(+) and a.surgeon= u1.user_job_id(+) and a.anes_doctor=u2.user_job_id(+) and a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE = u3.user_job_id(+) and a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE = u4.user_job_id(+) and A.OPER_STATUS_CODE>35 and a.patient_id = f.patient_id(+) and a.visit_id = f.visit_id(+) and a.visit_id = d.visit_id(+) and a.oper_id = f.oper_id(+) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.dept_code=:deptcode or :deptcode is null) and (a.anes_method like '%' || :vanesmethod || '%' or :vanesmethod is null) and (a.anes_doctor = :vanesdoctor or :vanesdoctor is null) and (a.operation_name like '%' || :voperationname || '%' or :voperationname is null) AND nvl(F.Anes_Effect, '其他') = :VANES_EFFECT

select d.inp_no, A.PATIENT_ID, A.VISIT_ID, A.OPER_ID, b.name, B.SEX, fun_get_pat_age( b.date_of_birth ,a.in_date_time ) age, nvl(c.dept_name, a.dept_code) deptname, a.operation_name, TO_CHAR(a.in_date_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') start_date_time, nvl(u1.user_name,a.surgeon) surgeon, a.oper_scale, a.anes_method, nvl(u2.user_name,a.anes_doctor) anes_doctor, a.asa_grade, to_char(a.start_date_time,'hh24:mi') opertime, decode(a.emergency_ind,1,'急诊','择期') emergency_ind, nvl(u3.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE) FIRST_OPER_NURSE, nvl(u4.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE) FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE from med_operation_master a, med_pat_master_index b, med_dept_dict c,med_pat_visit d, med_his_users u1,med_his_users u2,med_his_users u3,med_his_users u4 ,MED_ANESTHESIA_INPUT_DATA f where (f.death_after_oper=1 or f.anes_death=1) and a.patient_id = b.patient_id and a.patient_id=d.patient_id(+) AND A.VISIT_ID=D.VISIT_ID(+) and a.dept_code = c.dept_code(+) and a.surgeon= u1.user_job_id(+) and a.anes_doctor=u2.user_job_id(+) and a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE = u3.user_job_id(+) and a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE = u4.user_job_id(+) and A.OPER_STATUS_CODE>35 and a.patient_id = f.patient_id(+) and a.visit_id = f.visit_id(+) and a.oper_id = f.oper_id(+) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.dept_code=:deptcode or :deptcode is null) and (a.anes_method like '%' || :vanesmethod || '%' or :vanesmethod is null) and (a.anes_doctor = :vanesdoctor or :vanesdoctor is null) and (a.operation_name like '%' || :voperationname || '%' or :voperationname is null) AND nvl(F.Anes_Effect, '其他') = :VANES_EFFECT
